title: IModelDocExtension.GetAdvancedSaveAsOptions
description: Gets the advanced File > Save As options.

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Save with references options as defined in swSaveWithReferencesOptions (see Remarks )

remarks:
Call this method before calling
IModelDocExtension::SaveAs3
.
IAdvancedSaveAsOptions::GetItemsNameAndPath
returns a list of items according to how the Options parameter is specified in this method.
